seo_keywords: Bissell CrossWave Pet Pro smelling bad
CrossWave Pet Pro brush not spinning

problems.title: Clogged with Pet Hair / Low Suction
problems.description: Machine leaves clumps of wet hair on the floor.
possible_causes: Pet hair strainer in dirty tank is full
solution_steps: Empty the dirty tank and clean the red hair strainer.
Check the suction path at the foot.
Replace the filter if it is coated in mud/hair.

problems.title: Bad Smell While Cleaning
problems.description: The machine smells like wet dog.
solution_steps: Always remove the brush roll to dry after use.
Use the Pet Multi-Surface Formula with Febreze.
